lines.text: I'm not fat, I'm big-boned.
No, Jay Leno's chin is big-boned. You are a big fat ass.
We're guys, dude. We find something about all our friends to rip on. We made fun of you for being rich for the same reason we rip on Butters for being wimpy.
And we rip on Kyle for being a Jew.
And Stan for being in love with Wendy. And Cartman for being fat. And Cartman for being stupid. And Cartman for having a whore for a mom. And Cartman for being a sadistic asshole.
Hey. You did me already.

[with a sigh, calmly]
Oh, my God, we killed Kenny.

[shouts]
We killed Kenny?
Yup. We're bastards.
But what if I'm trying to put on the nose, the snowman comes alive and tries to kill me?
Tweek, when has that ever happened, except for that one time?
We're not getting on, you fat ugly bitch.

[shouting]
What did you say?
I said, "We're not getting on, you fat ugly bitch."
Oh.
Whoa, dude.
I always wondered if that would work.
I'm not fat, I just haven't grown into my body yet you skinny bitch.
Eric. If you call Wendy a bitch one more time I'm sending you to the principal's office.
[beat]
Bitch.
That's it Eric, you...
I'm going.

[after a crowd tramples Kenny]
Oh my God, I found a penny.
You bastard.
Oh, the tears of unfathomable sadness! Yummy!
Mmmmf mmmf mmmmmf mmmmmmm mmmmf mmmmf mmmmmmmmf mmmf.
Totally, dude.
Good point, man.
Why don't we all sing, "Kyle's Mom is a Stupid Bitch" in D-minor?
Don't worry, Tweek. Your family can go on welfare. Kenny's family's on welfare and they're happy, isn't that right, Kenny?

[muffled]
Fuck you.
Oh my god. Jay Leno's chin killed Kenny.
You bastard.
Ah, who cares? He dies every episode.
Saddam. But... I killed you.
Well where was I supposed to go, Detroit?
Kenny's family is so poor, they had to put their cardboard box up for a second mortgage.
I'm not fat, I'm festively plump.
Boys, I haven't seen you in church lately.
Well, I'm Jewish.
You're not too Jewish to worship Jesus, are you?
I guess not.
Jimmy, will you go talk to Wendy for me?
F-F-for wh-what?
Just go talk to her, and be poetic. Tell her she's my muse. No, tell her... tell her... she's a continuing source of inspiration to me.
She's what?
She's a continuing source of inspiration to me.
Okay. Hey, W- Hey, Wendy.
Yeah?
Stan says you're a cont... you're a cont... Stan says you're a cont- cont...
[sounds like "cunt"]
Well, tell Stan to stop!
[walks away]

[continues]
... cont... You're a continuing source of inspiration to him.
Hey! Hey! Hey! What's goin' on Rudy?
Man, Fat Abbot, you need to lose weight!
I lose weight when I feel like it, bitch! Shut your bitch-ass mouth, ho!
Bitch, I'll kick yo' ass!
You think you slick, you punk ass blasphemous dope fiend bitch! I had my jimmy whacked 7 times last week, I'll bust a cap in your mother fuckin' ass.
TIMAH.
Naw dude, independent films are those black and white hippy movies. They're always about gay cowboys eating pudding.
Wow, cartoons are getting really dirty.
If irony was made of strawberries, we'd all be drinking a lot of smoothies right now.
You go to hell. You go to hell and you die.

You're watching MTV, the cool, brainwashing, 12-year-old-and-younger station that hides behind a slick image. We're so cool that we decide what's cool. And now MTV News. The News that is single-handedly dumbing-down our country, which is cool.
[gay and straight protesters get a hearing from the Governor of South Park on gay marriage]

I believe that I might have come up with a compromise to this whole problem that will make everyone happy! People in the gay community want the same rights as married couples, but dissenters don't want the word "marriage" corrupted. So how about we let gay people get married, but call it something else?
[everyone listens quietly]
You homosexuals will have all the exact same rights as married couples, but, instead of referring to you as "married", you can be... butt buddies.
[long silence]
Instead of being "man and wife", you'll be... butt buddies. You won't be "betrothed", you'll be...
[makes quote with his fingers]
... butt buddies. Get it? Instead of a "bride and groom", you'd be...
[makes quote with his fingers again]
... butt buddies.
We wanna be treated equally!
You *are* equal. It's just that, instead of getting engaged, you would be... butt buddies. And everyone is happy!

[from the lesbian crowd]
Well, what about lesbians?
Well, like anyone cares about fuckin' dykes!
[the crowd goes into an uproar]

[embarrassed]
Oh, God, I was sure that would work.

[Butters is holding a Barbie doll]
"Hey there, Butters, wanna slap my titties around?" Uh, no thanks, ma'am. I might get in trouble again.
[he puts the doll away and begins whistling]
You so much as TOUCH kitty's ass, and I'll put a firecracker in your nutsack and blow your balls all over your pants.
Jesus, Cartman.
Well, I'm just sayn', man, seriously, don't mess with kitty, man.
I don't want to do it if it hurts or if it makes you get all sticky.
Don't lie, Stan. Lying makes you sterile.
Hello, Mrs. Brovlowski, this is Stan's mom. I was wondering if you might know why my son is trying to split his head open with an ice pick.
Aaaah. I have to get it out.
[walking up to a crucified Cartman]
T. T is for turtle.
Butters, remind me to cut your balls off later.
[repeated line]
Welcome to Shitty Wok!
[meant as City Wok]
WhatwhatWHAT?
[repeated line]
Dude, this is pretty fucked up right here.
Cartman, that's the dumbest thing you've ever said... this week.
White power! White power!

[as Mr. Hat]
White power!
[as Mr. Garrison]
Oh, I'm sorry, Chef, Mr. Hat is a racist son of a bitch.
[as Mr. Hat]
Don't apologize for me to that spear chucker.
[as Mr. Garrison; gasps]
Mr. Hat!
[runs]
Aaah!
I'm so high man, I don't think I can take it.
[about Jews]
They crucified Our Lord and Savior. If you don't go to hell for crucifying Our Savior, then what the hell DO you go to hell for?
Well God, I guess you got me again, didn't you? Yeah, that was a good one, God. Hope it made you laugh, you sick bastard.
...my mom lied to me just like your parents lied to you and now where poor like Kenny's family
[Kenny walks over to comfort Cartman]
Don't touch me Kenny.
I have never in my life done anything just for the money! If I'm lying may the Lord strike me down right now!
Uh oh.
[He slowly backs away from Cartman in fear]
[Cartman tries to get invited to the girls' party]
[in a false girl's voice]
"Oooh, there's Cartman, we should invite him to the party for sure... "
[as himself]
Fuck you, May, fuck you, Annie, fuck you, BeBe, fuck you, whatever your name is, and fuck you, bitch!
Oh my god! They killed Kenny.

[unenthusiastically]
You bastard.
Oh. I never should have shoved all those poor animals up my ass.
Hurry up! We're running late.
Ahh we're always running late, you fat hog.
What did you say?
I wish I could go to Prauge!
Yeah. Me too.
Oh, Jesus Christ.
The rest of you go get the goods on Stan. His mom grounded him once for setting something on fire. Let's find out what that something was and then lie and say it was a puppy.
I got my period.
Yeah, I could use some goddamn poontang, myself, right now.
James Taylor, what the hell are you doing singing about prostitutes to these children? Get outta here!

[after Bebe gets boobs]
Well, fuck you, Stan, fuck you, Kyle, and
[shouts]
fucky you, Kenny! Bebe, you're still cool!
Hey Phillip, guess what?
What?

[Farts]
Farrrrrrrrrrrrrrrt.
All animals kill, and the animals that don't kill are stupid ones like cows and turtles and stuff.
Oooh, Jesuth Christht.
Kids, let's keep it down for study group, or else Mr. Garrison is going to punish me.
she's a goddamn whore.
Oh, look what I did with Kyle's money. I had it changed into singles so I could roll around in it like this. Oh, Kyle's money.
Hey, hey, hey, what's goin' down, y'all?
Man, Fat Abbot, what you doin' on this side of the hood?
You know something, Rudy, you're like school in summer time.
School in summertime?
Yeah, bitch, school in summertime. Open up your fucking ears, you fucking ho or I'll pop your bitch ass.
I'm-a pop-a you-a bitch-a ass-a too-ba, Bitch-a.
This is just like Vietnam, huh fellas? Whoopee!
[repeated line]
Butters, what the hell are you doing?
Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Interrupting cow.
Interrupting cow wh...

[interrupting]
Mooo!
Come on Kyle. Just because your mom is a bitch doesn't mean that we all have to suffer.
Oh, this is a democratic boy band, is it?
[the boys are outside building a snowman]
I have a button we can use for his nose.
[Mumbling]
What would we use a marble-sack for?
Hey, hey, what's shakin' Rudy?
Man, Fat Abbott. You need to lose weight.
I lose weight when I feel like it bitch. Shut your bitch ass mouth, ho.
Guys, we have no choice. We're gonna have to move away. Environmental activists don't use logic or reason.
Mr. Slave, did you finish taking attendance?
All done-sy wun-sy.
OK, that's enough fat-ass jokes for this week.
Everything is back to normal. I-I think... I think I can go back to trying to destroy the world again.
Well, damn it, Eric, don't you have some smart-ass thing to say?
You little turds, you ruined my life for the last time
What do you think, Mr. Marsh? You ready to put a down payment on that baby?
Well yeah, but I just had one question about how it works. Well, it seems all the buttons on these front and rear flexi-grips are also found on the side of the vehicle.
Yep.
So, they don't really do anything.
Right.
So then, couldn't I just order one that works without going in and out of my ass and mouth?

[pause]
... Well, I guess you could.
Huh? What's that? What'd he say?

[Terrance and Phillip are in Halloween costumes, and Terrance farts]
That fart was absolutely GHOULISH Terrance.
Sit down or the bunny dies!
GOBBLES.
This is hopeless. We're just going to have to face that the commercialism has been sucked out of Christmas.
[repeated line]
Goddamn it, Cartman!
[repeated line]
You know, I learned something today.
Anyway, children, as I was saying, the Hare Krishna's are totally gay.
Oh, Kyle, you just made a huge withdrawal at the First Bank of Lies.
Jesse Jackson is not the emperor of black people!

[confused]
He told my dad that he is...
[repeated line]
Butters... You are GROUNDED!
Don't talk back Butters, go to your room! I don't know what's wrong with that boy. It can't be our parenting, we're awesome! He must have some kind of mental illness...
[repeated line]
Fellas!
